channel.title: aspnetcore on Website of Chris König
channel.description: Recent content in aspnetcore on Website of Chris König

item.title: Microsoft Identity Plattform - Create WEB API, SPA and Console Client
item.description: This series should describe you the concept and use of the Microsoft Identity Plattform. I will use aspnetcore 5 webapi and implement authentication and authorization from scratch. The most important know how ressource about the topic is this page.
